column1: '''Lintips''' were mysterious creatures only mentioned in [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] verse. Escaping and laughing at [[Tom Bombadil]]
column2: he complains saying they are the "only things that won't talk to me
column3: say what they do or what they be".<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
